original_text: And it shall come to pass, that he who fleeth from the noise of the fear shall fall into the pit; and he that cometh up out of the midst of the pit shall be taken in the snare: for the windows from on high are open, and the foundations of the earth do shake.
korean_text: 두려운 소리로 말미암아 도망하는 자는 함정에 빠지겠고 함정 속에서 올라오는 자는 올무에 걸리리니 이는 위에 있는 문이 열리고 땅의 기초가 진동함이라

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
that he who fleeth from the noise of the fear
and he that cometh up out of the midst of the pit
shall be taken in the snare
for the windows from on high are open
and the foundations of the earth do shake
